segment.phrase: Kwakwanaso
Anita amadya chakudya chamasana pomwe khwangwala anatera patsogolo pake. “Kwakwa,” anatero khwangwala, mwachisoni. Msozi unagwera pansi.
“Pepa iwe. Chavuta n’chiyani?” anafunsa Anita.
Khwangwala sanamuyankhe Anita. Anangoima kumamuyang’ana Anita kwa kanthawi. Kenaka, mwachangu, anamutsomphola chakudya chija m’dzanja lake.
“Iwe! Ndi chakudya changa chamasana chimenecho!” anakuwa Anita. Anadumpha mpanda ndi kuthamangira khwangwala uja. Anakwanitsa kudya chakudya cha Anita chija m’malere!
“Ndikugwira!” anatero Anita.
“Kwakwa!” anatero khwangwala. Kenaka chinachake chodabwitsa chinachitika. Mbalame ija inakula. Chipsepse chake chinafupika, ndipo mapiko ake anachepa.
“Ndikulota mwina?” anadabwa Anita. Koma mbalameyo imaonekadi mosiyana!
Khwangwala anayamba kudzandira m’malere. Mapiko ake anali aang’ono kwambiri!
Anagwa kuchokera m’malere, nthawi imene Salimu amadutsa ndi njinga yake.
“Chenjera!” anakuwa Anita.
“Hee?” anatero Salimu.
Phwa! Chinthu chomwe chinali khwangwala chija chinagwera pamwamba pa Salimu.
“Kwakwa!” chinakuwa, ndi kumuluma Salimu.
“Mayo!” anatero Salimu, akusisita mkono wake.
“Taima, kakhwangwala iwe!” anakuwa Anita.
“Ameneyo si khwangwala!” anatero Salimu. “Akuoneka ngati dainaso!”
“Kwakwa!” anatero khwangwala-dainaso, pamene nthenga zake zimayoyokera pansi.
Chinyamacho chinali chachikulu! Chinanjonjola ndi miyendo iwiri.
“Ndikuganiza chikupita kumsika,” anatero Salimu.
“Tiyenera tichiletse!” anakuwa Anita. “Nanga chitakaluma anthu ochuluka?”
Salimu ananena zoona. Kumsika kuja, khwangwala-dainaso uja anasokoneza! Anagwetsa zithandala ndi anthu. “Azakhali anga awo,” anatero Salimu, akuloza chakumsika. “Adziwa choti achite!”
Azakhali a Salimu anali mphunzitsi kwambiri.
“Chinyama chimenechi ndi chiyani?” anafunsa Anita.
“Sindikudziwa,” anatero azakhali. “Koma ngati mungachigwire, ndifufuza.”
“Ndichigwira!” analonjeza Anita. Anali wokwiya nacho chifukwa chinamubera chakudya chake. Anachithamangira ndi kuchidumphira pamsana.
“Ndachigwira!” anakuwa.
Khwangwala-dainaso amaonekabe wanjala. Nthawi iyi amathamangitsa buluzi. “Zodabwitsa!” anatero azakhali. “Chinyama ichi chimadya nyama ndi zomera. Ndi chophatikiza.”
“N’chifukwa chiyani chikulira?” anafunsa Salimu.
“Chinyama ngati ichi chimafunika kudya kwambiri. Tiyeni tipite kunyumba kwanga,” anatero azakhali. “Ndili ndi chakudya chambiri choti chingadye.”

“Ndikuganiza ndi dainaso,” anatero azakhali, chinyama chija chikugalima chakudya chawo chonse. “Akhwangwala ali ndi mafupa opepuka kuti aziwuluka, koma ichi mafupa ake ndi aakulu ndi olemera. Komanso chili ndi mchira wautali ndi mano akuthwa. Komabe ndi chofana ndi khwangwala amene chinali.”
“Koma titani nacho?” anafunsa Anita.
“Chitha kukhala ndi ine,” anatero azakhali. “Tiyeni tichitche Kwakwanaso!”
Kwakwanaso anagwedeza mutu. Anali wosangalala ndi dzina lake latsopano, komanso abwenzi atsopano!
